e: ￹`Safana'~ `sa~`~ `ira~ `cingra~ `inacila~.￺He came unexpectedly yesterday.￻他瞞著，其實他昨天就來了，他昨天意外的來了
d.f: ￹￺suddenly * unexpectedly without notice￻突然的，意外，毫無留意

e: ￹`Sa~`fana'~`en~ `ni~`~ `satan~ `ci~`~ `Yis~ `a~ `papi~`sanga'~ `to~ `epang~.￺Satan tried to tempt Jesus to make bread.￻撒但試探耶穌把石頭變成麵包
￹`Ma~`safana'~ `nira~ `kako~.￺I succumbed to his tempting me.￻我經不起他的誘惑
d.f: ￹￺to tempt to do something not intended￻不情願的去嘗試某事
